statements: SELECT * FROM InventoryTracking;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM InventoryTracking WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM InventoryTracking WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, barcode_value, location FROM InventoryTracking WHERE rfid_tag IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM InventoryTracking WHERE barcode_value LIKE 'ABC%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryTracking WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC, location DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, location FROM InventoryTracking WHERE barcode_value LIKE 'BN%' OR barcode_value LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, barcode_value, location FROM InventoryTracking WHERE rfid_tag IS NOT NULL AND location IN ('Warehouse', 'Store') ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, location FROM InventoryTracking WHERE quantity <= 5 OR location = 'Backroom' ORDER BY quantity DESC, location ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, barcode_value, location FROM InventoryTracking WHERE quantity > 0 AND location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_id, quantity, location FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_id, barcode, location FROM Inventory ORDER BY barcode DESC;
SELECT product_id, rfid_tag FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT movement_id, timestamp, to_location FROM InventoryMovement ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, rfid_tag, location FROM Inventory WHERE barcode = '12345';
SELECT * FROM InventoryMovement WHERE from_location = 'Warehouse' AND to_location = 'Store' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_id, timestamp FROM InventoryMovement WHERE to_location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT barcode, rfid_tag, location FROM Inventory WHERE location LIKE '%Room%';
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT shipment_id, sender_name, arrival_date FROM shipments ORDER BY arrival_date DESC;
SELECT receiver_name, shipment_date FROM shipments WHERE receiver_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT item_id, location, status FROM item_movements WHERE status = 'in transit' ORDER BY movement_date;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, sender_name, receiver_name FROM shipments WHERE arrival_date >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT item_id, location, status FROM item_movements WHERE movement_date BETWEEN '2021-09-01' AND '2021-09-30' ORDER BY location, movement_date DESC;
SELECT id, barcode, rfid_tag, item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT movement_id, item_id, location FROM item_movements WHERE status = 'shipped' ORDER BY item_id ASC, movement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM barcode_scanners;
SELECT id, scanner_model, manufacturer FROM barcode_scanners WHERE scanner_type = 'Handheld';
SELECT rfid_model, frequency FROM rfid_technology ORDER BY rfid_type ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT id, movement_date, from_location, to_location FROM movement_tracking ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM barcode_scanners WHERE manufacturer='ABC Company';
SELECT id, scanner_model, scanner_type FROM barcode_scanners ORDER BY scanner_model DESC;
SELECT * FROM rfid_technology WHERE frequency='UHF' AND rfid_type='Passive' ORDER BY rfid_model ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, category, quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM movement_tracking WHERE movement_date >= '2022-01-01' AND movement_type='Transfer' ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT id, name, barcode FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT name, last_scanned_at FROM products ORDER BY last_scanned_at DESC;
SELECT id, location, capacity, manager FROM warehouses WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT s.id, s.name, sc.name AS scanner_name, sc.location AS scanner_location FROM scanners s JOIN scans sc ON s.id = sc.scanner_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY last_scanned_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT name, barcode FROM products WHERE quantity < 50
SELECT name, quantity FROM products WHERE barcode IS NULL
SELECT p.name, w.name AS warehouse_name, m.quantity FROM products p INNER JOIN movements m ON p.id = m.product_id INNER JOIN warehouses w ON m.warehouse_id = w.id
SELECT s.timestamp, p.name AS product_name, sc.name AS scanner_name FROM scans s INNER JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.id INNER JOIN scanners sc ON s.scanner_id = sc.id ORDER BY s.timestamp ASC
